title: Pset_SpaceThermalRequirements
description: Properties related to the comfort requirements for thermal and other  thermal related performance properties of spaces that apply to the occurrences of IfcSpace, IfcSpatialZone or IfcZone. It can also be used to capture requirements for IfcSpaceType's. This includes the required design temperature, humidity, ventilation, and air conditioning.

SpaceTemperature.title: SpaceTemperature
SpaceTemperature.description: Temperature of the space or zone, that is required from user/designer view point.  If no summer or winter space temperature requirements are given, it applies all year, otherwise for the intermediate period. Provide this value, if no temperatur range (Min-Max) is available.

SpaceTemperatureMax.title: SpaceTemperatureMax
SpaceTemperatureMax.description: Maximal temperature of the space or zone, that is required from user/designer view point.  If no summer or winter space temperature requirements are given, it applies all year, otherwise for the intermediate period.

SpaceTemperatureMin.title: SpaceTemperatureMin
SpaceTemperatureMin.description: Minimal temperature of the space or zone, that is required from user/designer view point. If no summer or winter space temperature requirements are given, it applies all year, otherwise for the intermediate period.

SpaceTemperatureSummerMax.title: SpaceTemperatureSummerMax
SpaceTemperatureSummerMax.description: Maximal temperature of the space or zone for the hot (summer) period, that is required from user/designer view point and provided as requirement for cooling.

SpaceTemperatureSummerMin.title: SpaceTemperatureSummerMin
SpaceTemperatureSummerMin.description: Minimal temperature of the space or zone for the hot (summer) period, that is required from user/designer view point and provided as requirement for cooling.

SpaceTemperatureWinterMax.title: SpaceTemperatureWinterMax
SpaceTemperatureWinterMax.description: Maximal temperature of the space or zone for the cold (winter) period, that is required from user/designer view point and provided as requirement for heating.

SpaceTemperatureWinterMin.title: SpaceTemperatureWinterMin
SpaceTemperatureWinterMin.description: Minimal temperature of the space or zone for the cold (winter) period, that is required from user/designer view point and provided as requirement for heating.

SpaceHumidity.title: SpaceHumidity
SpaceHumidity.description: Humidity of the space or zone that is required from user/designer view point.  If no summer or winter space humidity requirements are given, it applies all year, otherwise for the intermediate period. Provide this property, if no humidity range (Min-Max) is available.

SpaceHumidityMax.title: SpaceHumidityMax
SpaceHumidityMax.description: Maximal permitted humidity of the space or zone that is required from user/designer view point.  If no summer or winter space humidity requirements are given, it applies all year, otherwise for the intermediate period.

SpaceHumidityMin.title: SpaceHumidityMin
SpaceHumidityMin.description: Minimal permitted humidity of the space or zone that is required from user/designer view point.  If no summer or winter space humidity requirements are given, it applies all year, otherwise for the intermediate period.

SpaceHumiditySummer.title: SpaceHumiditySummer
SpaceHumiditySummer.description: Humidity of the space or zone for the hot (summer) period, that is required from user/designer view point and provided as requirement for cooling.

SpaceHumidityWinter.title: SpaceHumidityWinter
SpaceHumidityWinter.description: Humidity of the space or zone for the cold (winter) period that is required from user/designer view point and provided as requirement for heating.

DiscontinuedHeating.title: DiscontinuedHeating
DiscontinuedHeating.description: Indication whether discontinued heating is required/desirable from user/designer view point. (TRUE) if yes, (FALSE) otherwise.

NaturalVentilation.title: NaturalVentilation
NaturalVentilation.description: Indication whether the space is required to have natural ventilation (TRUE) or mechanical ventilation (FALSE).

NaturalVentilationRate.title: NaturalVentilationRate
NaturalVentilationRate.description: Indication of the requirement of a particular natural air ventilation rate, given in air changes per hour.

MechanicalVentilationRate.title: MechanicalVentilationRate
MechanicalVentilationRate.description: Indication of the requirement of a particular mechanical air ventilation rate, given in air changes per hour.

AirConditioning.title: AirConditioning
AirConditioning.description: Indication whether this space requires air conditioning provided (TRUE) or not (FALSE).

AirConditioningCentral.title: AirConditioningCentral
AirConditioningCentral.description:
Indication whether the space  requires a central air conditioning provided (TRUE) or not (FALSE).
It should only be given, if the property "AirConditioning" is set to TRUE.
